author: Loren Grush
title: Three astronauts are heading back from space, with a smaller welcoming crew to greet them
description: Three astronauts are set to journey home from the International Space Station, landing in Kazakhstan at 1:17AM ET on Friday, April 17th. They’ll be greeted by a smaller welcoming committee then normal as an extra precaution during the COVID-19 pandemic.
content:
How to come back to Earth during a pandemic
On Thursday afternoon, three astronauts on board the International Space Station will load into a Russian Soyuz capsule and embark on the more than three-hour journey back home to Earth just a week after another cr… [+3142 chars]
